Title: Chotushkone
Writer: Annapurna Basu (subtitles), Srijit Mukherji (story,  screenplay,  dialogue)
Actors: Aparna Sen, Chiranjit, Goutam Ghose, Parambrata Chatterjee
Plot: Four famous directors and old friends are reunited together by an unknown producer to make a film. They make four short story in this film with one theme: Death.
